original: intros n p k H f x y H0. apply ex_diff_n_deriv in H0. apply ex_diff_n_deriv_aux1 in H0. apply ex_diff_n_deriv_aux2 in H0. apply ex_diff_n_deriv_aux1 in H0. apply continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc with (f := fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z v) u) in H0. apply ex_diff_n_continuity_inf_1 with (n := n) in H. apply ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1 with (n := n) in H. apply ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_2 with (n := n) in H. apply ex_diff_n_m with (n := n) in H0. apply ex_diff_n_m with (n := n) in H0. apply ex_diff_n_deriv_aux2 in H0. apply ex_diff_n_deriv_aux2 in H. repeat unfold partial_derive in *. auto.
